name: Good faith purchaser
text: [§507-69]  Good faith purchaser.  A purchaser in good faith of goods sold to enforce a lien in favor of the owner on goods stored at a self-service storage facility takes the goods free of any rights of persons against whom the lien was claimed, despite noncompliance by the owner of the storage facility with the requirements of this part. [L 1984, c 239, pt of §1]
